CopperCube Professional

Swf format or as stand-alone. EXE files without writing a single line of code. The program creates a 3D-model, 3D-passing, 360 Ã‚Â° panoramas, "flying camera" and even a full-fledged three-dimensional games.

Possible to create scripts using Squirrel or Actionscript 3. The program is capable of rendering 3D CopperCube using Direct3D or OpenGL, and also uses an optimized, fast engine, which will allow you to work with a huge number of polygons. Files created in CopperCube,. SWF 3D are easily integrated into your own fleshevyj file. In addition, it is possible to create a variety of effects, such as first-person view, etc.

CopperCube Professional

As for imports, the CopperCube supports the following formats: My3DTools 3 (. My3D), STL meshes (. Stl), Alias ??Wavefront Maya (. Obj), B3D files (. B3d), (. Csm), DeleD (. Dmf) , FSRad oct (. oct), COLLADA (. xml,. dae), Irrlicht static meshes (. irrmesh), Lightwave 3D meshes (. lwo), Microsoft DirectX (. x), Milkshape (. ms3d), OGRE meshes (. mesh), Pulsar LMTools (. lmts), Quake 3 levels (. bsp), Quake 2 models (. md2), Cartography shop 4, 3D Studio meshes (.3 ds).

CopperCube 4 includes the following new features:

The particle system to create fire, smoke, rain, fountains, etc.
